title: Fun off meta picks
body: It's simple, just let me know of any funny off meta picks or builds for preferably top and support just because I like top and me and my friend like to mess around in bot lane. Don't worry I won't use these in ranked.

replies.body:
{{champion:121}} support is hilarious and can make plays.
{{champion:89}} is sometimes played as Top.
What do I build for Leona top if you know.
I think a few diamonds play her in ranked as top, so there might be builds for that there if you look around.

Ap lucian is quite fun. 
Full ap nami
hp-regen support-dinger.
Support j4.
Play AP Pantheon. At full build, his ult does 2000 damage.
AP Teemo Support, Tank Teemo Top, are both hilarious. Put grasp of the undying on Teemo and he will troll hard.
As much as I despise tryndramere, ap tryn is pretty hilarious. His heals are ridiculous
Especially with rageblade and nashors feeding into AS. Oh god what have i done.....
Just played AP last night in ARAM. That was fun
